text: and consultation. 11.65 Examples of potential social value contributions, that should be project specific: z spatial and environmental improvement works that improve health and well-being, adopt gender inclusive design, and create safer spaces; z encouraging more local representation in Design Review Panels (including upskilling local residents to participate) â€“ with a particular focus on underrepresented communities and groups; z contributions (including donations, resources and staff volunteering) to local community projects that tackle poverty and the cost-of-living crisis; z providing training and skills opportunities (including internships, work experience and graduate placements) for individuals facing barriers to employment i.e. long-term unemployed, Young People Not in Education, Employment or Training (NEETs), care leavers, ex-offenders, and residents with special educational needs and disabilities (SEND residents);
